title: Turning the Page
text:
Welcome, Reader.
To play Coverse, first read the story text on the current page. Then, below are the command buttons. Click a button to make your choice and go to the next part of the story.

commands.name: Skip
commands.text: Skip the tutorial

title: Unwritten Chapters
text:
Sometimes Reader, you might reach a point where a page is blank – the path is unwritten.
When this occurs, the choice is yours: turn back and explore elsewhere, or become the author of the next page and continue the story in your own words.

commands.name: Write page a page
commands.text: Turn to an unwritten page.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: How do I turn the page again?

title: The rabbit hole
text: Alright Reader, so you get the idea of how things work. It's time for you to jump in and explore the stories in Coverse, and write your own.

commands.name: Start exploring
commands.text: Turn the page.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Remind me about blank pages

commands.name: Ohh a secret
commands.text: What's this ? A folded corner in the book ?

title: Awakening
text: You awaken seated at a simple wooden desk in a stark, white room. Apart from the desk and chair, there's only one object of note—a large bookshelf standing against the far wall, filled with books of every imaginable style and size.

commands.name: Stand up
commands.text: Stand up and move to the center of the room.

commands.name: Inspect desk
commands.text: Closely examine the surface and drawers of the desk.

commands.name: Examine chair
commands.text: Carefully check the chair you're sitting on.

title: Center of the Room
text: You are standing in the center of the stark, white room. There's a simple wooden desk and chair behind you, and a large bookshelf ahead, filled with books of every imaginable style and size.

commands.name: Inspect desk
commands.text: Examine the desk carefully.

commands.name: Check chair
commands.text: Look over the chair.

commands.name: Approach bookshelf
commands.text: Move closer to inspect the bookshelf.

title: Inspecting the Desk
text: You meticulously search the desk but find nothing unusual or helpful. Just plain wood, empty drawers, and a spotless surface.

commands.name: Go back
commands.text: Return to the center of the room.

title: Checking the Chair
text: The chair is simple and sturdy, offering no secrets or hidden compartments. Just an ordinary wooden chair.

commands.name: Go back
commands.text: Stand up and return to the center of the room.

title: Bookshelf
text: The bookshelf is crowded with books of every conceivable description: large and small, thick and thin, colorful and drab, hardback, paperback, leather-bound, and more. It's overwhelming at first glance.

commands.name: Left side
commands.text: Examine the left side of the shelf.

commands.name: Center
commands.text: Inspect the central section of the shelf.

commands.name: Right side
commands.text: Look at the right side of the shelf.

commands.name: Step back
commands.text: Return to the center of the room.

title: Left Side Books
text: On the left side, the shelves are densely packed. You can choose from books on the top, middle, or bottom shelf.

commands.name: Top Shelf
commands.text: Look at the top shelf.

commands.name: Middle Shelf
commands.text: Inspect the middle shelf.

commands.name: Bottom Shelf
commands.text: Examine the bottom shelf.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the bookshelf.

title: Center Books
text: The center shelves are neatly organized. You see an array of diverse books arranged top, middle, and bottom.

commands.name: Top Shelf
commands.text: Look at the top shelf.

commands.name: Middle Shelf
commands.text: Inspect the middle shelf.

commands.name: Bottom Shelf
commands.text: Examine the bottom shelf.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the bookshelf.

title: Right Side Books
text: On the right side, books lean casually against each other. The shelves—top, middle, and bottom—each hold unique collections.

commands.name: Top Shelf
commands.text: Look at the top shelf.

commands.name: Middle Shelf
commands.text: Inspect the middle shelf.

commands.name: Bottom Shelf
commands.text: Examine the bottom shelf.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the bookshelf.

title: Left Top Shelf
text: The topmost shelf on the left side holds a diverse collection of books.

commands.name: Large Red Volume
commands.text: Select the large red volume.

commands.name: Spine Covered in Dust
commands.text: Select the book whose spine is covered in a fine layer of dust.

commands.name: Thin Green Book
commands.text: Select the thin green book.

commands.name: Thick Brown Hardback
commands.text: Select the thick brown hardback.

commands.name: Spine Feels Rough Parchment
commands.text: Select the book whose spine feels rough, like old parchment.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the left side of the shelves.

title: Left Middle Shelf
text: This middle shelf on the left contains books that appear frequently accessed.

commands.name: Small Pink Romance Novel
commands.text: Select the small, pink book that seems like a romance novel based on its color and size.

commands.name: Orange Paperback
commands.text: Select the orange paperback.

commands.name: Large Encyclopedia Volume
commands.text: Select the large, heavy volume that resembles an encyclopedia due to its thickness and binding.

commands.name: Grey Thin Volume
commands.text: Select the grey thin volume.

commands.name: Black Thick Book
commands.text: Select the black thick book.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the left side of the shelves.

title: Left Bottom Shelf
text: The bottom shelf on the left contains a few interesting titles.

commands.name: Spine Cracked and Brittle
commands.text: Select the book whose spine has a cracked, brittle appearance from age.

commands.name: White Small Book
commands.text: Select the white small book.

commands.name: Dark Blue Volume
commands.text: Select the dark blue volume.

commands.name: Spine With Reddish-Brown Stains
commands.text: Select the book with faint reddish-brown stains on the spine.

commands.name: Light Green Paperback
commands.text: Select the light green paperback.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the left side of the shelves.

title: Right Top Shelf
text: On the top shelf of the right side, the books are neatly arranged.

commands.name: Beige Thin Book
commands.text: Select the beige thin book.

commands.name: Spine Peculiar Raised Texture
commands.text: Select the book whose spine has a peculiar, raised texture under your fingers.

commands.name: Olive Green Book
commands.text: Select the olive green book.

commands.name: Navy Blue Hardback
commands.text: Select the navy blue hardback.

commands.name: Spine Warped By Moisture
commands.text: Select the book whose spine is warped, as if exposed to moisture.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the right side of the shelves.

title: Right Middle Shelf
text: The middle shelf on the right side holds books of various sizes.

commands.name: Cream Colored Book
commands.text: Select the cream colored book.

commands.name: Book Part Of Reference Series
commands.text: Select the book whose spine suggests it's part of a reference series.

commands.name: Violet Volume
commands.text: Select the violet volume.

commands.name: Cyan Paperback
commands.text: Select the cyan paperback.

commands.name: Spine Smooth Like Polished Stone
commands.text: Select the thin book with a spine that feels unusually smooth, like polished stone.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the right side of the shelves.

title: Right Bottom Shelf
text: The bottom shelf on the right side contains older volumes.

commands.name: Gold Colored Spine
commands.text: Select the book with a gold colored spine.

commands.name: Spine Dull Metallic Grey
commands.text: Select the book whose spine is a dull metallic grey, hinting at a technical manual.

commands.name: Silver Colored Spine
commands.text: Select the book with a silver colored spine.

commands.name: Bronze Colored Spine
commands.text: Select the book with a bronze colored spine.

commands.name: Spine Like Rough Sackcloth
commands.text: Select the book whose spine is covered in a material that looks and feels like rough sackcloth.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the right side of the shelves.

title: Center Top Shelf
text: The top shelf in the center section holds prominent books.

commands.name: Book With Striped Spine
commands.text: Select the book with a striped spine.

commands.name: Small Thick Childrens Book
commands.text: Select the small book with a spine that seems disproportionately thick for its height, suggesting a children's book.

commands.name: Book With Patterned Spine
commands.text: Select the book with a patterned spine.

commands.name: Book Slightly Larger
commands.text: Select the book slightly larger than its neighbors.

commands.name: Spine Deeply Indented Vertically
commands.text: Select the book whose spine is deeply indented with vertical lines.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the center section of the shelves.

title: Center Middle Shelf
text: The middle shelf in the center section contains frequently used books.

commands.name: Book Slightly Smaller
commands.text: Select the book slightly smaller than its neighbors.

commands.name: Spine Gnawed At Edges
commands.text: Select the book with a spine that looks like it's been gnawed on at the edges.

commands.name: Large Red Volume 2
commands.text: Select the large red volume.

commands.name: Small Blue Paperback 2
commands.text: Select the small blue paperback.

commands.name: Thin Green Book 2
commands.text: Select the thin green book.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the center section of the shelves.

title: Center Bottom Shelf
text: The bottom shelf in the center section holds some larger or less common books.

commands.name: Spine Faded Ghostly Image
commands.text: Select the book whose spine has a faded, almost ghostly image visible.

commands.name: Thick Brown Hardback 2
commands.text: Select the thick brown hardback.

commands.name: Bright Glossy Graphic Novel
commands.text: Select the bright, colourful spine that feels glossy, like a modern graphic novel.

commands.name: Medium Yellow Book 2
commands.text: Select the medium yellow book.

commands.name: Orange Paperback 2
commands.text: Select the orange paperback.

commands.name: Go Back
commands.text: Return to the center section of the shelves.
